record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - October 01, 2007)

[Page: S12384]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Daniel Gutman and Jordan Anderson of my staff be granted floor privileges for the duration of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that MAJ John Muller, an Army fellow in my office, be granted the privilege of the floor for duration of consideration of H.R. 1585.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Reid, I ask unanimous consent that Jacqueline Beatty-Smith, a Brookings Fellow in his office, be granted the privileges of the floor during consideration of the Defense Appropriations Act.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
